body_html: @apaszke lol torch.__file__ isn't as informative as it should be. It just pointed me to /usr/local/lib/python2.7/.... But I've uninstalled all the previous torch packages installed through pip and rerun the local setup script and it seems to work!
body_text: @apaszke lol torch.__file__ isn't as informative as it should be. It just pointed me to /usr/local/lib/python2.7/.... But I've uninstalled all the previous torch packages installed through pip and rerun the local setup script and it seems to work!
body: @apaszke lol `torch.__file__` isn't as informative as it should be. It just pointed me to `/usr/local/lib/python2.7/...`. But I've uninstalled all the previous torch packages installed through pip and rerun the local setup script and it seems to work!
